data.title: Games for Creativity, Mindfulness and Connection | OuiSi
data.meta_description: OuiSi ("we-see") is a home for games and activities that encourage conversation, observation, imagination, creativity and connection in people age 4 to 104.
data.text:
OuiSi makes award-winning sets of Visually Connecting Photo Cards – "this looks like that" – with a Guidebook full of games that ignite fun, creativity and curiosity, regardless of age.

OuiSi Original Photo Cards capture small marvels from the "everyday," while OuiSi Nature celebrates the shapes, colors and patterns of our planet.

Both sets offer a unique opportunity to connect with friends and family through relaxed and collaborative play.

OuiSi Photo Cards "Visually Connect" based on shared patterns, shapes and colors. It's accessible yet fun and challenging for kids (4+) and adults alike.

Each Photo Card has 10-20 matches, meaning thousands of Visual Connections in a box. You simply can't play the same game twice.

When you get the hang of Visual Connections, choose one of the 12 games and activities from the Guidebook. Play OuiSi in groups or solo.

What's inside: 210 photo cards, a guidebook with a dozen games, all in a sturdy and beautiful box.

Creative brain games: Level the playing field with gameplay that challenges all ages and backgrounds.

Conversation: OuiSi will have everyone talking, without fights over who is winning and losing.

Shipping: We ship within 1-2 business days via Royal Mail 48-hour service from our UK warehouse.

If players especially enjoy the element of surprise, they will like the subtlety of OuiSi Original. These Photo Cards capture beauty in the "everyday," like the pattern of a cracked sidewalk.

Nature fans will enjoy the patterns and colors found in OuiSi Nature. These Photo Cards also have QR codes on their backs that link to a unique webpage. There, players can learn more about the nature depicted.

OR, GET BOTH AND GET 20% OFF.

We believe that everything is connected. That life is a richer experience when we are curious about each other.

We are passionate about collaboration, conversation, co-creation and open-ended play. This is time well spent, at any age.
